wikipedia_page.main: Ross Tollerton VC (6 May 1890 – 7 May 1931) born in Hurlford, Ayrshire, was a Scottish recipient of the Victoria Cross, the highest and most prestigious award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces.

response: * Ross Tollerton, awarded the Victoria Cross for his actions at the First Battle of the Aisne in 1914.

link_mentions.page: List of Scottish Victoria Cross recipients
response: *Ross Tollerton – 1914; Battle of the Aisne, France
